## ASTAwarePolicyDefinition interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Definition of an AST-aware policy capability.

This extends the base PolicyDefinition to create policies that can leverage the full structural context from AST analysis.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ASTAwarePolicyDefinition<TOptions extends ASTAwarePolicyOptions = ASTAwarePolicyOptions> extends Omit<BasePolicyDefinition<TOptions>, 'createPolicy'> 
```
**Extends:** Omit&lt;[BasePolicyDefinition](./change-detector-core.policydefinition.md)<!-- -->&lt;TOptions&gt;, 'createPolicy'&gt;
